name: lambda-entry-status
author: Michael Bausano <bausanomichal@gmail.com>
description: Checks if a user can reclaim given reward.

scripts.create:stage: claudia create --name stage-entry-status --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::490542543401:role/ReadsDynamoDB --config claudia-stage.json
scripts.create:prod: claudia create --name prod-entry-status --region eu-west-1 --handler index.handler --role arn:aws:iam::490542543401:role/ReadsDynamoDB --config claudia-prod.json
